Setting the Agenda

After logging in, you will be able to see details of your next meeting and its agenda. If you want to adjust the agenda for a meeting you just have to do the following steps:

  1. Click “ADD A GENERAL ITEM” located in the left portion of the page.

  1. The new item will then appear in the right portion of the page and will have the “General Item” name.

  1. Click the item you just added and name it accordingly by clicking on it.

  2. You may then drag the whole item through the agenda list in the order that you prefer.
